entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
